questions.question: What is the average quality of service for low-priced, medium-priced and high-priced products?

answer.value: The average quality of services for high-priced goods is around 4.; The quality of services for mid-range priced goods is not significantly different from that of high-end products on average. However, there are many more low-end products.; The cheap orders are highly polarized, consisting of half of high-quality items and half of low-quality ones.

key_insights: The average quality of services for high-priced goods is around 4.
The quality of services for mid-range priced goods is not significantly different from that of high-end products on average. However, there are many more low-end products.
The cheap orders are highly polarized, consisting of half of high-quality items and half of low-quality ones.
